PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2015-02412015-02-26PWGSC,  ,  ,  , 
ActDepartment of Public Works and Government Services Act
SubjectProvision of procurement of goods and services and procurement services
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Public Works and Government Services to do anything relating to the powers, duties and functions assigned under paragraphs 6(a), (b) and (c) of the Act that she may do for or on behalf of any department, board or agency of the Government of Canada, for or on behalf of the government of any province or municipality in Canada, any Canadian aid agency or public health organization or any intergovernmental organization or foreign government.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
